Compatible with iOS 11 and 12
Compatible with iPhone X

Razer Chroma inspired HomeBar coloring tweak for iPhone X, also works with LittleX.

Thanks tofor testing with LittleX.

Configure options from Settings.

Fix settings bundle for A12. Added support for arm64e. Thanks @ENMPRUP for testing on iOS 12! Fixes:
- Updated wave animation to fix battery drain

Other tweak support:
- Now works with HomeGesture on non-iPhone X devices

New Features:
- Added option to change opacity of HomeBar
- Wave Direction & Animation Interval
- Spectrum Interval
- Fade Interval
- Breathing Interval
